full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS @008B DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHOD 'GROGS AEM CHI BKA' BCU PA DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI DKAR PO MI LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BAS, BKRA SHIS PA BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN BRLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG MIG TSIG LHANG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MOD, RANG RI LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THAB SKYED DANG SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGG CHEN PO'I 'GUG BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' SDUS NAS, RAB 'BYAMS NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BYUG ZHES SA ME MO GLANG LO BA'I HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSES BZANG PAR 'GRIGS PA'O, ,)
